summary: The Q1 project timeline has been updated following a client request to deliver the initial prototype by March 10. Consequently, design assets must be finalized by March 5, and engineering is tasked with prioritizing API integration this week. The team will review progress during Friday's sync.
key_points: Client requested prototype delivery by March 10 (changed from March 20).
Design assets must be finalized by March 5.
Engineering needs to prioritize API integration this week.
